action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

We have yet another carpet tile range to add to the website. This is called 'Elemental'. Colours codes below.

The hero image (there's only one at this stage), colour swatches and spec sheet are all in the link here:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/d73hvm130ltg5q1/AABt5Kd9Jsin3NwKoZC9TYvia?dl=0

Can we have the copy to be:

TOP RHS:

The Elemental collection of QuietBack™ carpet tiles takes inspiration from the randomness of the natural environment. Each color is made from an original yarn thread-up of 3 complementary colors, woven together to create unique blends across a tonal palette of warms, blues and greens. The elaborate thread blend mimics the intricacies and subtle color integrations found in nature; making Elemental comfortable, grounding and inimitable.

DETAILS:

The Elemental collection of QuietBack™ carpet tiles takes inspiration from the randomness of the natural environment. Each color is made from an original yarn thread-up of 3 complementary colors, woven together to create unique blends across a tonal palette of warms, blues and greens. The elaborate thread blend mimics the intricacies and subtle color integrations found in nature; making Elemental comfortable, grounding and inimitable. Each tile is produced from 100% solution dyed nylon carpet tile in the 500mm x 500mm (19.7" x 19.7") square format, and available in twelve beautiful colorways. Elemental QuietBack™ carpet tiles are designed specifically for superior acoustic performance.
